content: गारुड {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (डी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [गरुडस्येदं अण्] {@--1@} Shaped like Garuḍa. {@--2@} Coming from or relating to Garuḍa. --डः, --डं {@--1@} An emerald; <ls>R. 13. 53.</ls> {@--2@} A charm against (snake) poison; संगृहीतगारुडेन <ls>K. 51</ls> (where it has sense 1 also). {@--3@} A missile presided over by Garuḍa. {@--4@} A military array (व्यूह) of the shape of Garuḍa. {@--5@} Gold.
